surface_layer.definition: A component of the Powertrain Control Module responsible for transmission control.

deep_layer.mechanism: The TCU controls transmission parameters such as gear shifting, torque converter lockup, and shift timing.
deep_layer.origin: Part of the broader electronic control system in modern vehicles.

SPATIAL.location: Engine compartment, often near the engine or inside the vehicle cabin
connected_to: Sensors (e.g., speed sensors, throttle position sensor)
